data.eml:eml: A new species of Huarpea Pate, 1947 from Colombia and redescription of H. wagneriella (du Buysson, 1904) (Hymenoptera: Sapygidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernández, Fernando, Sarmiento, Carlos E. (2015): A new species of Huarpea Pate, 1947 from Colombia and redescription of H. wagneriella (du Buysson, 1904) (Hymenoptera: Sapygidae). Zootaxa 3994 (3): 439-444, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3994.3.8
